thread.title: BRIEF-Masimo Announces CE Marking Of Rad-97 Pulse CO-Oximeter With Integrated NomoLine Capnography

title: BRIEF-Masimo Announces CE Marking Of Rad-97 Pulse CO-Oximeter With Integrated NomoLine Capnography
text:
April 10, 2018 / 12:07 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Masimo Announces CE Marking Of Rad-97 Pulse CO-Oximeter With Integrated NomoLine Capnography Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Masimo Corp: 
* MASIMO ANNOUNCES CE MARKING OF RAD-97™ PULSE CO-OXIMETER® WITH INTEGRATED NOMOLINE™ CAPNOGRAPHY 
* 97 IS NOW AVAILABLE BOTH WITHIN AND OUTSIDE UNITED STATES IN THREE CONFIGURATIONS 
* CONTINUOUS OXYGENATION AND VENTILATION MONITORING WITH UPGRADEABLE RAINBOW PARAMETERS IN A COMPACT, STANDALONE DEVICE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
